ygData.msgSnippet: Well, if you have a scenario converter with built-in error checking features, you ve got a good start on working on a new editor. I ve noticed that the order

Subject: Scenario Converter/New Editor

From: "Daniel Paul Hightower" <dph_of_rules@...>

Well, if you have a scenario converter with built-in error checking 
features, you've got a good start on working on a new editor.

I've noticed that the order of placement of teleporters effects which 
directions they go.  Tom Ricket, how exactly does the game decide 
where a teleporter takes you if there are more than 2 teleporters of 
the same type?  Does it read the file and look for the next available 
spot or is that info in the grid file?
